scout_response.name: HSTATUS_VSXL_LEGAL_VALUES
scout_response.description: Valid values for VSXL field are 0 (32) and 1 (64)
scout_response.spec_quote: Determines the effective XLEN in VS-mode. Valid values are: 0=32, 1=64

scout_response.name: HSTATUS_VSXL_ACCESS_TYPE
scout_response.description: VSXL field is read-only when implementation only supports one VSXLEN
scout_response.spec_quote: Because the implementation only supports a single VSXLEN == 32, this field is read-only-0.

scout_response.name: HSTATUS_VTSR_CONTROLS_TRAP
scout_response.description: VTSR field controls Virtual Instruction exception on sret
scout_response.spec_quote: When hstatus.VTSR is set, executing the sret instruction in VS-mode raises a Virtual Instruction exception.

scout_response.name: HSTATUS_VTW_CONTROLS_TRAP
scout_response.description: VTW field controls Virtual Instruction exception on wfi
scout_response.spec_quote: When hstatus.VTW is set, a wfi instruction executed in VS-mode raises a Virtual Instruction exception.

scout_response.name: HSTATUS_VTVM_CONTROLS_TRAP
scout_response.description: VTVM field controls Virtual Instruction exception on sfence.vma
scout_response.spec_quote: When set, a 'Virtual Instruction' trap occurs when executing an sfence.vma, sinval.vma, or an explicit CSR access of the satp.
